item.title: SSH命令问题汇总
item.author: 文章作者
item.description:
no matching host key type found. Their offer: ssh-dss

使用SSH登录时报错如下：

1

Unable to negotiate with 20.1.1.174 port 22: no matching host key type found. Their offer: ssh-dss
